section.heading: Appointment and duties of Registrar.
section.text: The Director of the Department of Health shall appoint the Registrar who shall:

para.text: Be in charge of administering the vital records system and be the custodian of its records; and
Develop and distribute forms or other means for transmitting data to carry out the reporting and registration purposes of this chapter.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 14-299 substituted “Department of Health” for “Department of Human Services”.
This section is referenced in § 1-608.01 and § 7-228.
